name: Ascendant (itch) (Somewhat Unsettling)
description:
Are we alone in the Universe?

Ascendant invites you to explore a procedurally generated constellation of other peoples' thoughts, each taking the form of a unique star. Leave your mark on the Universe; share short words of wisdom, encouragement, dreams, memories, or moments that were special to you. Each thought you share helps make our universe feel that little bit more connected.
